body_html:
This is ready for review / good to go.
The next thing that's left for SpatialTransformers is to add the grid generator from an affine 6D matrix. But this PR itself is hugely useful to various vision folks, for example @jcjohnson who uses the bilinear resampling

body:
This is ready for review / good to go.
The next thing that's left for SpatialTransformers is to add the grid generator from an affine 6D matrix. But this PR itself is hugely useful to various vision folks, for example @jcjohnson who uses the bilinear resampling
